items.title: El Framework JavaScript Progresivo
items.summary: Vue (pronunciado /vjuÀê/, como view) es un framework progresivo para construir interfaces de usuario. A diferencia de otros frameworks monol√≠ticos, Vue est√° dise√±ado desde cero para ser utilizado incrementalmente.

items.title: Mi primer Post
items.summary: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.

items.title: Say hello to Gridsome üéâ
items.summary: A new static site generator baby is born. It's highly inspired by Gatsby.js (React based) but built on top of Vue.js. We have been working on it for a year and will have a beta ready soon. You can expect this baby to grow up fast!
